titles.title: If Ye Then Be Risen With Christ

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If ye then be risen with Christ,
Seek those things which are from above.
Set your affections on things on high,
Not on earth.
For ye are dead and your life is hid,
With Christ who is in our God
When He shall appear,
We shall appear with Him in glory

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We'll be glorified, we'll be glorified
When He shall appear,
We shall appear with Him in glory
We'll be glorified, we'll be glorified
When He shall appear,
We shall appear with Him in glory.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Si habeis pues resucitado,
Buscad las cosas de arriba.
Poned la vista en los cielos y no en la tierra.
Pues tu vida escondida esta,
Con Cristo a la diestra de Dios.
Cuando aparezca, apareceremos
Con el en Gloria.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Nos glorificara, nos glorificara.
Cuando aparezca,
Apareceremos con el en gloria.
Nos glorificara, nos glorificara.
Cuando aparezca,
Apareceremos con el en gloria.
